text: Is a place of serenity that bring peace in our hearts, while our minds remembering our ancestors. Water droplets drip nicely into a bottle. However, overtime, the minerals may choke the outlet... Reminding us we need to cleanse ourselves frequently, so that flows will continue, fresh water shall fill our vessel.

Newly completed not so long ago.It provides further studies and knowleges of Buddhism.The compound is link together with Kong Meng San Phor Kark See Monastery.
Dared : 04/09/2017 (Monday).
The Buddhist College of Singapore. It was established in the year of 2005 within the premises of Kong Meng San Phor Kark See Monastery by Venerable Sik Kwang Sheng.
We are proud of our college, it gave us the chance to broaden the horizon and study as an international student. Love it so much...! 😘  🙏🙏🙏 🌸🌸🌸🌸
Best Infrastructure in this area to show the Chinese architecture .
